headline: BMO Capital Cuts Moody’s (MCO) Target as Sector Valuations Compress
summary: Moody’s Corporation (NYSE:MCO) is included among the 14 Best Warren Buffett Dividend Stocks to Buy. On February 9, BMO Capital lowered its price recommendation on Moody’s Corporation (NYSE:MCO) to $480 from $561. It reiterated a Market Perform rating on the stock. The analyst noted that the company delivered stronger-than-expected results, supported by solid debt issuance activity. […]
